translateMethod:
```swift
func testLoadActivitiesReturnSuccess() {
    activitiesRepository.getActivities(-1, callback: mockedLoadActivitiesCallback)
    verify(serviceApi).getAllActivities(eq(-1), callback: activitiesServiceCallbackCaptor.capture())
    activitiesServiceCallbackCaptor.value.onLoaded(activitiesList, nextcloudClient, -1)
    verify(mockedLoadActivitiesCallback).onActivitiesLoaded(eq(activitiesList), eq(nextcloudClient), eq(-1))
}
```

```swift
func testLoadActivitiesReturnError() {
    activitiesRepository.getActivities(-1, callback: mockedLoadActivitiesCallback)
    verify(serviceApi).getAllActivities(eq(-1), callback: activitiesServiceCallbackCaptor.capture())
    activitiesServiceCallbackCaptor.value.onError("error")
    verify(mockedLoadActivitiesCallback).onActivitiesLoadedError(eq("error"))
}
```
